projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
One of customer want to know some info about following id in CLSUserDefaults.plist file.

{quote}
I found on the device/mobile an file named "CLSUserDefaults.plist" and inside it an information about "vendor_id" 

My questions are: 

1 - Is that information (vendor_id) receiving or is be sending to the any webserver??? Appcelerator or Crittercism??? 

2 - What's the meaning of this information??? 

3 - This information stays on the device/mobile???
{quote}
fields.summary: Information - Vendor ID data on the file CLSUserDefaults

comments.body: I haven't seen this file before. Looks like something to do with Crashlytics. And I believe none of our products contain crashlytics.
